column5: Our MSc in International Project Management will provide you with the knowledge and the skills necessary for successfully managing international projects in various organisations that operate across borders and with a multinational workforce.You will learn international and project management theories, approaches, and methods, which you will also apply to concrete cases through innovative project-based modules that involve cases from real-life companies.
column7: For more information, please visit the programme page on our website.
column9: Full-time: 1 year, Part-time: up to 4 years
